languages.text: Маражай подтвердил вину погибшего агента Инквизиции, в красках рассказав о пытках, которым подверг несчастного, дабы заполучить его послушание и верность. Как и подтвердил то, что Ирлиэт выследила и убила его мон-кайскую игрушку. Однако немногие захотели верить словам проклятого ксеноса, и тайна смерти Ахиллеаса Скаландра так и не было оглашена.

Marazhai confirmed the guilt of the deceased Inquisition agent and described in detail the torture he inflicted upon the poor soul to gain his obedience and loyalty. He also confirmed that Yrliet had found and killed his mon-keigh toy. Yet few chose to believe the words of the cursed xenos, and thus the secret of the death of Achilleas Scalander was never publicly known.
languages.original_text: Маражай подтвердил вину погибшего агента Инквизиции, в красках рассказав о пытках, которым подверг несчастного, дабы заполучить его послушание и верность. Как и подтвердил то, что Ирлиэт выследила и убила его мон-кайскую игрушку. Однако немногие захотели верить словам проклятого ксеноса, и тайна смерти Ахиллеаса Скаландра так и не было оглашена.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai confirmed the guilt of the deceased Inquisition agent and described in detail the torture he inflicted upon the poor soul to gain his obedience and loyalty. He confirmed as well that Yrliet found and killed his mon-keigh toy. Yet, few chose to believe the words of cursed xenos, and thus the secret of the death of Achilleas Scalander, was not brought to the public.

He confirmed as well that Yrliet found and killed his mon-keigh toy. Yet, few chose to believe the words of cursed xenos, and thus the secret of the death of Achilleas Scalander, was not brought to the public.

He confirmed as well that Yrliet found and killed his mon-keigh toy. Yet, few chose to believe the words of the cursed xenos, and thus the secret of the death of Achilleas Scalander was not brought to the public.

He also confirmed that Yrliet had found and killed his mon-keigh toy. Yet few chose to believe the words of the cursed xenos, and thus the secret of the death of Achilleas Scalander was never publicly known.

Marazhai confirmed the guilt of the deceased Inquisition agent and described in detail the torture he inflicted upon the poor soul to gain his obedience and loyalty. He also confirmed that Yrliet had found and killed his mon-keigh toy. Yet few chose to believe the words of the cursed xenos, and thus the secret of the death of Achilleas Scalander was never publicly known.

languages.text: 玛拉斋证实了已故审判庭特工的罪行，详细描述了他是如何通过酷刑折磨那个可怜的灵魂，以此获得他的忠诚与顺服。他也证实了，是伊莉耶特发现了他的猴子玩具，将其杀害。不过，几乎没人相信这个邪恶异形的话语。因此，阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德之死的真相，至今都没有公之于众。
languages.original_text: Marazhai confirmed the guilt of the deceased Inquisition agent and described in detail the torture he inflicted upon the poor soul to gain his obedience and loyalty. He also confirmed that Yrliet had found and killed his mon-keigh toy. Yet few chose to believe the words of the cursed xenos, and thus the secret of the death of Achilleas Scalander was never publicly known.

traits.locale_text: 玛拉斋证实了已故审判庭特工的罪行，详细描述了他是如何通过酷刑折磨那个可怜的灵魂，以此获得他的忠诚与顺服。他也证实了，是伊莉耶特发现了他的猴子玩具，将其杀害。不过，几乎没人相信这个邪恶异形的话语。因此，阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德之死的真相，至今都没有公之于众。

languages.text: Marazhai bestätigte die Schuld des verstorbenen Agenten der Inquisition und beschrieb in allen Einzelheiten, wie er die arme Seele gefoltert hatte, um sich den Gehorsam und die Loyalität des Mannes zu sichern. Er bestätigte auch, dass Yrliet sein Chem-Pan-Sey-Spielzeug gefunden und getötet hatte. Kaum jemand aber schenkte den Worten des verfluchten Xenos Glauben, und so kam das Geheimnis um den Tod von Achilleas Scalander nie ans Licht.
languages.original_text: Marazhai confirmed the guilt of the deceased Inquisition agent and described in detail the torture he inflicted upon the poor soul to gain his obedience and loyalty. He also confirmed that Yrliet had found and killed his mon-keigh toy. Yet few chose to believe the words of the cursed xenos, and thus the secret of the death of Achilleas Scalander was never publicly known.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai bestätigte die Schuld des verstorbenen Agenten der Inquisition und beschrieb in allen Einzelheiten, wie er die arme Seele gefoltert hatte, um sich den Gehorsam und die Loyalität des Mannes zu sichern. Er bestätigte auch, dass Yrliet sein Chem-Pan-Sey-Spielzeug gefunden und getötet hatte. Kaum jemand aber schenkte den Worten des verfluchten Xenos Glauben, und so kam das Geheimnis um den Tod von Achilleas Scalander nicht ans Licht.

languages.text: Marazhai confirma la culpabilité du défunt agent de l'Inquisition et décrivit avec force détails les tortures qu'il lui avait infligées afin de le contraindre à l'obéissance et à la loyauté. Il confirma également qu'Yrliet était responsable de la mort de son jouet mon-keigh. Cependant, on accorda peu de crédit aux paroles d'un maudit xénos, et c'est pour cette raison que le secret de la mort d'Achilleas Scalander ne fut jamais révélé au grand jour.
languages.original_text: Marazhai confirmed the guilt of the deceased Inquisition agent and described in detail the torture he inflicted upon the poor soul to gain his obedience and loyalty. He also confirmed that Yrliet had found and killed his mon-keigh toy. Yet few chose to believe the words of the cursed xenos, and thus the secret of the death of Achilleas Scalander was never publicly known.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai confirma la culpabilité du défunt agent de l'Inquisition et décrivit avec force détails les tortures qu'il lui avait infligées afin de le contraindre à l'obéissance et la loyauté. Il déclara également qu'Yrliet était responsable de la mort de son jouet mon-keigh. Cependant, on accorda peu de crédit aux paroles d'un maudit xénos, et c'est pour cette raison que le secret de la mort d'Achilleas Scalander ne fut jamais révélé au grand jour.

languages.text: Marazhai confirmó la culpabilidad del agente fallecido de la Inquisición y describió en detalle la tortura que infligió al pobre desdichado para hacerse con su obediencia y lealtad. Aseguró también que Yrliet encontró y mató a su juguete mon-keigh. Aun así, muy pocos creyeron las palabras del xenos maldito, de modo que la verdad sobre la muerte de Achilleas Scalander nunca se hizo pública.
languages.original_text: Marazhai confirmed the guilt of the deceased Inquisition agent and described in detail the torture he inflicted upon the poor soul to gain his obedience and loyalty. He also confirmed that Yrliet had found and killed his mon-keigh toy. Yet few chose to believe the words of the cursed xenos, and thus the secret of the death of Achilleas Scalander was never publicly known.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai confirmó la culpabilidad del agente fallecido de la Inquisición y describió en detalle la tortura que infligió al pobre desdichado para hacerse con su obediencia y lealtad. Aseguró también que Yrliet encontró y mató a su juguete mon-keigh. Aun así, muy pocos creyeron las palabras del xenos maldito, de modo que la verdad sobre la muerte de Achilleas Scalander nunca se hizo pública.

languages.text: マラズハイは死んだ異端審問官の罪を認め、彼の服従と忠誠を得る目的で哀れな魂に加えた拷問について詳しく説明した。彼はまた、ユリエットが彼のモン＝ケイのおもちゃを見つけて殺したことも認めた。しかし呪われた異種族たちの言葉を信じる者はほとんどおらず、アキレアス・スカランダーの死の秘密が公になることはなかった。
languages.original_text: Marazhai confirmed the guilt of the deceased Inquisition agent and described in detail the torture he inflicted upon the poor soul to gain his obedience and loyalty. He also confirmed that Yrliet had found and killed his mon-keigh toy. Yet few chose to believe the words of the cursed xenos, and thus the secret of the death of Achilleas Scalander was never publicly known.

traits.locale_text: マラズハイは死んだ異端審問官の罪を認め、彼の服従と忠誠を得る目的で哀れな魂に加えた拷問について詳しく説明した。彼はまた、ユリエットが彼のモン＝ケイのおもちゃを見つけて殺したことも認めた。しかし呪われた異種族たちの言葉を信じる者はほとんどおらず、アキレアス・スカランダーの死の秘密が公になることはなかった。

languages.text: Marazhai, ölen Engizisyon ajanının suçlu olduğunu teyit etti ve kendisine itaat edip sadık kalması için zavallıya çektirdiği işkenceleri bir bir anlattı. Mon-keigh oyuncağını Yrliet'in bulup öldürdüğünü de teyit etti. Yine de lanetli zenonun sözlerine fazla inanan olmadığından Achilleas Scalander'ın ölümünün ardındaki sırlardan kamuoyunun haberi olmadı.
languages.original_text: Marazhai confirmed the guilt of the deceased Inquisition agent and described in detail the torture he inflicted upon the poor soul to gain his obedience and loyalty. He also confirmed that Yrliet had found and killed his mon-keigh toy. Yet few chose to believe the words of the cursed xenos, and thus the secret of the death of Achilleas Scalander was never publicly known.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai ölen Engizisyon ajanının suçlu olduğunu teyit etti ve ona karşı itaatkâr ve sadık olması için zavallıya ettiği işkenceleri detaylı bir şekilde anlattı. Mon-keigh oyuncağını Yrliet'in bulup öldürdüğünü de teyit etti. Yine de lanetli zenonun sözlerine fazla inanan olmadı ve dolayısıyla Achilleas Scalander'ın ölümünün arkasındaki sırlar kamuoyunca öğrenilemedi.
